content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my deck one night. it was a warm summer night.I was staring at the night sky.
i noticed a violet light which seemed to be very far out. you could tell it was in space by the distance.
the color was close of that to a black light as it seemed almost fluorescent, it was traveling quite fast for the distance at which i took it to be.
it's path was straight and i watched it for about 5 minutes.I couldn't believe what i was seeing.
i noticed a neighbor down in the driveway and yelled to him.I asked if he could see what i saw but i was on the fourth floor and there was a building blocking his view.He thought i was crazy and didn't want to come look.
i looked back and the object was still there,i had to find it again and noticed as i watched it that it split into two. 
the second object continued with the first then angled off then shot away in reverse direction at a 45 degree angle deep into space, as from my perspective.
the first object then increased in speed and disappeared from view as well.
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo

content.detailedDescription: This happened back in the late 60s ,or very early 70s. my father was out plowing late one night in the fall when all of a sudden directly over head, a very intense bright white light just came on. he said it lite up the tractor and the plow and the ground all around it. he was plowing with an old 400 farmall with a3-bottom plow. he said it went from night to day because it was so bright. he was scared so he took the plow out of the ground and took off for the farm yard. he said the light came on for a few seconds then went off. my father is 64 now, he never said anything about this untilseveral years later. it took place 4 miles north and 1 mile west of algona ia. he never drank anykind of alcohol at this point of his life. he worked full time at universal mgf. co. at the time. he was helping a farmer when this took place. i just got the web so i thought  i would pass this on to you. i could possibly find out more about this incident if you would want more infomation.
content.summary: Very bright light came on over top of tractor out plowing around 1:am in the morning

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from class.  i was driving downhill on congdon mill rd past the west greenwich volunteer fire department.  i saw two very bright white lights in the sky as i neared a small one lane bridge.  i first thought it was a low flying commercial airliner.  however, through the treetops i saw what was in fact a line of three white lights.  the center light was slightly oval shape and ran perpendicular to the assumed shape of the object.  i say assumed since i could not discern a true shape of the object.  there was still a touch of sunlight remaining but i could make out no definite shape.  this means it must have been high in the sky.  from the furthest light to the other it measured approx. 2 inches.  it moved slowly over my car and stopped abruptly at roughly a 45 degree angle from my seat.  it began to move after a second of being still in the same direction only to stop abruptly once more.  after another brief second it slowly (slower than before) kept its course and drifted over my car.  i had already turned off the radio and rolled down the window.  it made no noise, no engines no humming.  i first thought it to be a commercial airliner but being that large in the sky it would be close enough to hear the engines.  i wasn't afraid per say but very curious.  it didnt seem to want to harm me or anything like that so i was pretty calm.  another curious note is that after it had drifted over me and i continued on the way home my vision became a tad blurry and i had a headache i had not had previously to witnessing this object.  these ailments vanished as quickly as they came however, lasting only a few moments.
content.summary: Trio of lights seen moving adn stopping in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I know i saw something i cannot describe,but here goes.  i was sitting in my upstairs room using the computer, when my five year old son said mom what do they call those things in the sky.  he asked me a few more times when curiosity kicked in. i opened my small balcony door so. i could take a better look.  what i saw was impressive to say the least.  it looked like a vey bright orb pinkish in color with a very bright tail. it appeared to be travelling straight up. i watched this for about a minute, then it started traveling horizontally at a very fast pace. i knew i would lose track of it so i ran down stairs to keep looking, this took me about 30 seconds. when i got outside i could not see it.  i did not see it again. 
after about 10 minutes i noticed a faint contrail in the sky, i kept my eye on it, there was no sound and appeared to traveling very fast from west to east. then it dove straight down for what seemed like 30 seconds it quickly turned in the opposite direction and disapperared.

what i saw today was very strange. i used to aircraft f;ying close to my house. miami int'l airport is close by. i'm wondering if anyone saw this.
content.summary: Glowing orb with short very bright contrail

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from st ann wi. when we saw this huge-round shaped object flying low and extremely slow,making no noise approaching us, it looked to me like a double decker bus, i counted about 6-windows on it.  it stopped, and some small little lighted spheres started to surround it then they scattered into different directions,i tried to focus on just a few,so as to remember what i was seeing, then it continued,again moving very slowly. since this isnt the first time i witnessed something i trained myself to remain calm and remember what i am looking at.  i just cant stop talking about it,or get it off my mind !  the spheres took off and disappeared, but the bus,i described it,kept moving slowly  along.
content.summary: It looked like a double decker bus,with  double sets of blackened windows and just as big,which is why we noticed it so easily

content.detailedDescription:
This will be my 3rd post to this site in the last 4-5 weeks. i was able to capture this video & image, from my backyard, using my digital camera. when i first took the video, i thought i was only capturing the blinking item in the center of the shot. when the clip is watched closely, there is much more to it.

1 - watch the 3-4 orbs enter the screen from the left. this happens in the first few seconds of the video. watch close because they fly very fast. the orbs seem to travel behind the cloud and exit the right of the screen. the orbs are changing directions.

2 ��� the original object slowly descends down from the cloud. again, watch close while the object makes a full circle towards the camera and then back to its location. 

i will also attach a photo that was taken shortly after the video. the orbs typically appear perfectly round. out of 30 images i was able to take yesterday, only one really takes on a life of its own. i have not made up my mind of what these things are. after i saw this picture, i am almost positive they are trying to say something.

if anyone has any feedback please email me at hsibilly@hotmail.Com. i am very interested in what anyone has to say.
content.summary: Another orb sighting over north phoenix (video)

content.detailedDescription:
I have lived at the above address for 8 yrs. we live in the flight path of west palm beach intl airport. iam used to large commuter air traffic over my house. there is something else up there. it is difficult to describe. i will do my best but understand that nothing is as extraordinary as the experience itself. there are what i believe to be a type of craft that cannot be seen by the naked eye buzzing the sky over my home. this is not a joke and i am not crazy. the craft sound as if they have no engine but rather glide a very high rates of speed. i and all of my family and friends have heard and followed these craft by ear. they sound like they pop in and out of a hole in the sky, although they cannot be seen. they appear to be trying to follow commercial air commuter jets or using the noise for cover as they sometimes pop out of the hole a few seconds after the jets fly over. also this is not jet engine reverberation off the atmosphere... they come when nothing is in the sky sometimes as well. on overcast days they go crazy all day long, with very little commercial air traffic. all of this has been going on in my life for the last 8 years. i would say that i  have witnessed this phenomenon atleast a thousand times.
sincerely mark a zaskey. please come listen for yourselves.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Possible worm hole over my home.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was attending jackson state university during the month of august of 2005.  at that time the national weather service said a huge hurricane was
headed for the gulf of mexico. i was paying very close attention to the news broadcast, so i would know which direction the storm was headed. unfortunately the storm was headed toward louisiana, mississippi,& alabama.
around the time between 3 & 4:oo p.M. the wind was picking up rapidly.
i lived in an apartment complex located in south jackson. while the storm was headed this direction power in the city of jackson started to go out.
i was still able to watch the news, then the power went out. i went outside so i can watch the trees. "why"? because in the area i lived in it was surrounded by huge trees. if those trees would had fallen they would had fallen on top of the apartments. me and my neighbor where the only people outside after the power failed. around 6:00 p.M. & 8:00 p.M.
the storm had reach the gulf. the wind and rain was incredible to view.
i was looking up at the sky and saw a glowing object running look like from hurricane katrina. it was moving very, very fast. i asked my neighbor
what the hell is that? he replied "man i don't know"?
however, this would not be my last sighting of strange objects over the city of jackson, ms. i have another story to tell. about how these object 
entire our skies. their technology is incredible. i know yall get alot of messages and stories. but what i seen in the past 2 & 1/2 years have truly convience me that mankind is being watched, studied.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observe this object while hurricane katrina was taking place. it was running from the storm very, very, fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the bus after school when an egg shaped object descended from the sky and hovered directly above me.  i floated upwards into the egg where i was greeted by what i believe was an alien.  i woke up several hours later not remebering what happened but, w/ a sharp pain in my buttocks.  after extensive hypnosis therapy i began remembering what happened.  i am scared they will return for me.  it made me sad.  help me...Please.
content.summary: I was abducted by a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Briefly, three events:

1. 1958 - walker afb, roswell n. mex. - black lines moving across the sky from west to east at sundown. (one other witness)

2. 1996 - joseph, oregon - something white and round oscillating over lake wallowa and then stabilizing before shooting over head to disappear into the clouds (no other witnesses).

3. 2000 - thousand oaks, ca - several (8-10) luminous objects in a random pattern moving across the sky. one seen to repeatedly dart from "formation" and then return (several potential witnesses).
 
for the record: i am a well educated individual with flight experience and a solid knowledge of aircraft.
content.summary: Group of 8-10 luminous objects - one darting from formation

content.detailedDescription:
In january 1977 i was 24 years old working as a carpenter's laborer during the warm months, but i was out of work for the winter of 1976 to 1977 and took a job as a security guard at wild acres lakes in dingman's ferry, pa.  this was and still is a lake community.  in january of 1977 there were a lot of completed homes in the area, many occupied year-round and many only on weekends by people from the ny metro area, just 60 miles or so to the east.  this area was also being actively developed at the time, with a real-estate/construction sales office at the entrance to the community, and with new lots being created from the swamps and woods, and new homes being built.  part of my job as security guard was to make sure nobody was stealing the building materials from the job-sites at night, in addition to making sure nobody was breaking in to the weekend homes during the week.

the night of the sighting was in january of 1977, but i can't recall exactly what date.  there had been a long spell of very cold weather, and everything was frozen solid.  the sighting was around 1 or 2 a.M., the temperature was probaby around zero, the air very crisp and clear, the ground had probably a foot or more of snow cover, snow was crunchy.  i don't recall a moon that night, but it was clear and very starry.  this area is very rural and dark at night, no streetlights or house lights where i was, but the sky to the east is lighter than the sky in the other directions because of the ny metro area 50 miles away causing light pollution.

on the night of the sighting i was in the volkswagen rabbit patrol car as usual, driving around the roads of the development.  at the time, during the day they were clearing a swamp with heavy equipment in one section of the development.  they would bulldoze the stumps into a big heap in the middle of the cleared swamp and burn them, so at night these piles of stumps would be glowing and sending up sparks, especially if the wind kicked up.  i would drive by several times during the night to make sure that sparks from the fires had not set off any brush fires in the surrounding woods.

on this night i was driving south on wild acres drive toward it's intersection with windwood drive.  at the time, there were no houses on the west or east side of wild acres drive on this section.  there was a swamp on the left (east) side of the road, between wild acres drive and the construction road.  this swamp was frozen solid and covered with snow.  i was on wild acres drive, about 500 to 1000 ft or so from it's intersection with windwood drive, when i saw out of my driver's window towards the east what i thought was a fire burning on the ground on the other side of the swamp.  the swamp here is about 1000 feet across, and then the ground rises up a small ridge maybe 20 feet in elevation, as i recall.  the fire was on the ground towards the top of the elevation.  it was clear, and i could clearly see the trees outlined against the snow and against the sky, which in the east was lighter than the rest of the sky, as explained above.  i thought at the time that they might possibly be clearing a new area for development, but i hadn't been told about it, and it was in an area where there had been no clearing going on the day before.  i was about 1/4 mile away, so i took out my binoculars, a good set as i recall, but i don't recall the exact specs.  i rolled down the drivers window and looked at the fire through the binoculars.  i was puzzled at what i saw, because now it looked like 2 fires instead of one, but it didn't burn like a fire.  the color was orange/yellow like a fire, but it seemed to be two balls of fire one right next to the other with no space between, side by side on the ground.  they burned steadily and brightly, not like a wood fire that flickers and has subtle color changes.  the colors were yellow/orange like a fire, but steady and bright.  i would guess that the total width was 10 to 15 feet, and height maybe 5 or 6 feet.  at a distance of a quarter mile, i could probably have blocked out the light from my naked eye with my fist on extended arm.  i didn't hear any sound at all, except for the engine running in the vw.  i looked at the fire through the binoculars for a minute or so, trying to figure out if it was a controlled burn or a brush fire, when suddenly i saw the dual balls of fire, still through binoculars, slowly rise straight up off the ground and through the trees until it was about 10 feet or so above the tops of the trees, and it hovered there for maybe 15 seconds or so.  at this time, i was just dumbfounded, is the only way i can describe it....What the h is that?  then after it hovered for about 15 seconds or so, it shot up into the sky at about an 80 degree angle from the horizon so fast that it just left a streak of yellow/orange light in the sky, like when you wave a flashlight wand at night and you see the trail of light as you wave it.  it just streaked up into the sky and disappeared.  i was certain at that point that it wasn't a fire.  i don't know what it was, but it certainly left an impression on me.

i did not drive over to the location to examine the ground.  i wish now that i had, and i can't explain why i didn't, but i didn't.  i just went about my job for the rest of the night and then went home, although i did remember thinking, wow, that was different!  i didn't mention it to anybody else for a long time, but i can remember it like it was yesterday.  i never saw anything like it before or since.  i have mentioned it to my family and a few friends, but the reaction is generally skeptical.  can't say as i blame them.

i have often wondered if there might have been a physical trace left on the ground...Radioactive, maybe, since any ground impression would have long been gone by now.  i have not been back to the area since 1977, although it's only a few miles from where i live now.  if i had a geiger counter i'd be tempted to go sweep the area, if they didn't kick me out.

the area surrounding wild acres lakes was then and is still very rural.  to the east is the delaware river and thousands of acres of undeveloped woodland of the delaware river national recreation area, as well as stokes state forest in n.J.  there are no airfields or military installations for miles in any direction.  what i saw was not the landing lights or running lights of an airliner flying west from newark, n.J....I see them all the time and i know what they look like coming, going and turning.

i'm 54 years old now in march of 2007.  i have worked as an insurance underwriter for nationally known companies for the past 29 years.  i am married, 2 children, own my own home.  i served in the u.S. army for 2 years from 1972 to 1974, and was honorably discharged at the end of my service.  my mos was military police, i served in the headquarters of 15th mp brigade in kaiserslautern, germany as a clerk in the plans and operations section.  i had a top secret security clearance, which required a successful background investigation to obtain.

here's a link to a google map of wild acres development in dingmans ferry, pa.  the area where the object was on the ground is just to the east of the construction road.  i was looking from the car on the other side of the blank area of the map to the west of construction road, which is a swamp, sitting on wild acres drive facing south and looking east.

http://www.Google.Com/maps?Q=dingmans+ferry,+pa,+usa&ie=utf8&z=16&ll=41.217662,-74.940963&spn=0.00962,0.026028&om=1
content.summary: Thought i saw fire burning in woods until it rose above trees, hovered for a bit, then shot upwards in a flash.

content.summary: Thought i saw fire burning in woods until it rose above trees, hovered for a bit, then shot upwards in a flash.

content.detailedDescription: I was out taking my daily walk.  i carry a digital camera to take picture of the water fowl at the lake behind my house.  the day was coll about 45 degrees with a very clear sky.  the wind was gusty about 25 mph.  i was returning home and was walking east on patterson ave.  when i got to the corner of patterson and osborne streets, ilooked over to my right which was south toward a tree where birds had gathered.  the tree was bare of leaves so i could see through it to the sky behind.  i noticed a bright white object in the sky traveling very fast and traveling north.  i took out my camera and was able to snap one picture before the object was beyond my cameras view.  the object was all white with no visable features.  it was cigar shaped and completely silent.  it was much lower than the jet contrail but highrt than the local private plans fly.  it covered the entire visable view of the sky from the south to north in about 20 seconds.  i watched it until it flew into a cloud far off to the north.  the entire incident took about 2 min.  i walked home and download the photo i am sending.  i was very calm and did not get too excited.  i am very used to looking at the sky being a bird watcher and an amateur astronomer.  i am a school teacher with a master's degree in education.
content.summary: All white cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription:
This is not the first time that we have seen this object.  it appears to be similar to an object we saw in august, 2006.  it is different from an object that we have also observed over western new york since october, 2005. 

i walked outside to bring in my dog from the yard and i saw a very bright light in the western sky at approximately 70 degrees above the horizon.  the light was very bright, with light rays eminating from it.  the light was not as bluish as halogen lights on cars, but as bright.  i called to my boyfriend to come out and look at the light,and he confirmed that it resembled the light that we had seen in august, 2006, and it moved slightly south while we were watching it.  it had also blinked when i had first gone outside, and moved slightly south, and closer.  i took 3 or 4 photographs of the object with a 35mm camera on 70mm zoom.  i had attempted to film the object in august, but it was too dark, and the object did not appear in the film.  this film was taken at just past dusk, so i am hopeful that the object appears in the photos.  it is triangular in shape from top to bottom (appearing taller than wide), and it hovers for hours.  the object is still in the sky, in the same place.

i am contacting you because i can't believe that we are the only people who have observed this object, and the silence of mainstream media in regard to these indidents is insane.  in august, we observed helicopters in the sky, that appeared to be approaching the object, and there was no mention of the incident on the news, or in the local newspapers.
content.summary: It has beams of white/bluish light emanating from it, and it blinks and moved closer

content.detailedDescription: 3 sphereic shape objects flying over my head in a triangular pattern. the two on the end were moving like no objects of this earth can move. they were metalic spheres no lights that i could see but there was some light reflecting off it. i am not the only witteness to this event, my brother was with me in my back yard when we saw them flying over head. we were outside smoking a cigerett and looking at the stars wehen we notice it.
content.summary: 3 sphereic shape objects flying over my head in a triangular pattern the two on the end were moving like no objects of this earth can move

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting second hand from my mother, who lives in durham, ct.  she reported this event to me, but she isn't one to report things like this publically.

she rose early on the morning of 27 march, 2007.  she was getting ready for work and letting the dogs outside.  she was looking at the horizon line, just before sunrise.  across the sky came what looked a bit like a shooting star, but much larger.  she said, from her perspective, that the object appeared as a broad streak across the sky, coloring from green to orange to yellow.  a shooting star streaks across the sky, never seeming to land or hit the ground.  my mother says this object appeared to land or crash, disappearing behind the treeline and out of sight.  there was no sound of a crash - the whole event was silent.  she became frightened, gathered the dogs, and went inside.  she is unsure if what she saw was a "ufo" or merely a meteorite burning up as it sped through the atmosphere, but it's unusal coloring and it's perceived "nearness" to her property unsettled her.
content.summary: Almost like a shooting star...

content.detailedDescription:
i felt it necessary to relate some background info in addition to describing the actual sighting, as it may or may not be significant to some readers.  
  when i was 18 (may of 1978) i began experiencing a series of phenomena that resulted in extreme psychological trauma.  it would take many pages to relate all that occurred, but basically, myself and a couple of friends came to the conclusion that the world was about to end.  we came to this conclusion simultaneously, albeit independently, without ever having had discussed anything like this hitherto.  ever.  we were happy-go-lucky pothead musicians. period.  
        one thing that helped solidify in our minds that we were indeed being warned by "something" about the imminent end of the world was when a friend of ours offered to read tarot cards for us.  i didn't have a clue as to what that was all about (i was a devout atheist and darwinist at the time)but i figured, uh, go for it.  interestingly, this girl drew the tarot cards twice and they came up exactly the same each time (except for one card the nature of which was significant in and of itself).  the cards' message (at least according to her interpretation) basically confirmed our newfound apocalyptic fears.  mind you, she wasn't even sure if she believed all of this herself.  
       at this time i was befriended by a 30 something women who offered to make stage clothes for me, as i was playing in a band.  i told her about my experiences and she believed me!!!!!!  she told me something apocalyptic was in fact imminent and that she had seen lights in the sky (i.E., ufo's).  being a von daniken buff, i had already concluded that whatever was warning my friends and i about doomsday must be extraterrestrial beings from a technologically advanced civilization. 
    one evening in june of 78 (shortly after my 19th birthday) this women called me up and told me to come over to her apartment, as the lights in the sky were going to show up that night.  she didn't call them ufo's - she called them "the powers that be."  i went over to her apartment and hung out with her and her 3 kids.  i did not indulge in any substances that evening.  clich���-like, at 12am, half hanging out of her 4rth story window looking out into the night sky, i saw a bright white orb appear out of thin air and begin to slowly move across the sky.  i yelled to my friend that the ufo's were here.  she was not surprised in the least.  myself, this lady and her 14 year old son went to the roof of the building and watched these lights appear out of nowhere, travel slowly and silently or hover.  we saw planes go by - they didn't appear to be planes.  at one point, 2 of them merged and sank below the manhattan skyline.  
     after about a half an hour, her son decided to go back to the apartment as it was a chilly evening and he was apparently used to seeing these things.  i thought he was nuts - this was the most monumental moment of my life and he was complaining about the cold!!!!!  after about an hour, they all disappeared and none reappeared.  i sat there with her on the roof for a few minutes after this spectacle ended in utter disbelief when all of a sudden a bright white light engulfed us for a few seconds.  i asked my friend if she had seen this and she calmly said yes.  she had tried taking photographs of the lights but nothing appeared in the developed photos.  i didn't think to call the police or check the newspaper the following day, but i didn't hear about any sightings.
     i was in shock after the sighting but my friend said that it was no big deal - she saw them all the time in the daytime and nighttime.  i should add, if it makes any difference, that she was a devoted follower of alistair crowley's teachings. she and her kids often experienced strange occultic phenomena (e.G., apparitions in her apartment, her camera, only after falling off of a table by itself would subsequently take pictures of auras). 
     i began to read the old testament, as, being raised jewish, was the only book i had ever heard of that talked about supernatural events and i had to find an answer to all of this.  during the summer and fall of 78, many bizarre poltergeist types of experiences became commonplace for me.  i was in a state of constant fear and confusion and could find no answers as to what was happening.  
     during midsummer, i told my drummer's wife about these events and she gave me a copy of the new testament.  me, a nice jewish boy from queens started reading the christian bible.  at the time, it seemed to fulfill a need that i had for objective morality, although i couldn't quite figure out what the heck the main message was.
      eventually, i began to question the goodness of the "powers" that were essentially driving me nuts!!!  one biblical passage in the book of ephesians states that our enemies are not flesh and blood, but the spiritual powers that reside in the heavens.  i connected this with the lights that i had, by this time, been seeing on a regular basis (other people i knew had seen them as well).  very long story short: in the fall of 78 i had an epiphany of sorts and was convinced that demons were plaguing me and that jesus had died for my sins.  i heard a voice in my belly (!!) tell me this during a particularly scary poltergeist-type moment.  immediately after this happened, i experienced a peace that i had never felt from pot and booze.  i felt completely elated for a couple of days.  i was friggin' floating!!!!
       although i couldn't deny what i had experienced, after a few years i fell away from the christian church.  i did so for a number of reasons: 1) i couldn't come to grips with the many discrepancies found in the bible.  2) it seemed that there was no agreement amongst the various christian denominations.  how can truth be truth if no one agrees what the hell it is? 3)  i was a very horny young man.  i prayed unceasingly to god to take my lust away from me to no effect.  4) the concept of hell, the advocacy of misogyny, slavery and genocide found in the bible was abhorrent to me.
      as the years have passed since that time, i have become increasingly jaded re: faith in god.  until last year, i was a child welfare worker for 11 years.  for 11 years i dealt with neglected and abused kids and their dead beat parents.  the evils and injustice of life continually ate away at me, making me more hateful towards god than i had ever been as an atheistic teenager.  on an intellectual if not emotional level, i simply could not believe in a benevolent god. 
     what torments me now is, despite the fact that i cannot believe in the god of the bible or a benevolent god in general, i still to this day cannot deny the things i experienced in my late teens and early 20's.  were the lights in the sky and subsequent spooky experiences (e.G., knocks on the wall, lights flickering when i seemingly had a key thought, an out of body experience, etc.) simply hallucinations or caused by something out there?  at age 47 i still can't figure it out.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Myself and two other people saw star-like orbs appear, move slowly and silently, hover,  merge and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is rene barrios. i have a small office where i work as a realtor, paralegal, notary public, tax preparer. i been writing poetry and two years ago i published a book. i study a major course in political science in the fuh sing kang college in taiwan. i took 32 units of psychology at a community college. i read the classics and a lot of phylosophy. i am a normal person father of one boy and two girls, all of them pursuing a professional career.
my wife is a physician from el salvador. i do not use or have been used any kind of drug. i do not have a drinking habit, i do not use any kind of medicament. i do not like to talk about this because some time people think you are not a normal person. 
that night my friends raul blanco and mario jarquincame to visit me at montecito heights. they both were always talking about the war in el salvador. this botter me. i always express my felings about the war.
they will stay overnight, but they decide to go sleep in an small plave we have in the back of the house, in order to feel free to talk about politics, war and guerrilla.
after they left, i check all the windos and doors to see if everything was lacked. then i went to bed.
three minuts after, i herd a noice like an electrical saw comming from behind the bathroom, in the patio, there was an orange tree.
i tried to stand up, but i could not move at all. i was frozen against my bed. 
suddenly three persons or whatever enter my bedroom. they use acrilic uniform blue and silver, with a zeus sign in the side of the hart.  there were two men and one girl. she did a medical something to me, open may pants and make sex on me. she was white, the men that was talking was black, and the other i can remember anything but that he was not moving at all. the gay that was talking speak very softly, talking about a son. later he said that i will not be able to remember anything that happened here. he took his glove, with hand was black. he puted his hand in my forehead and i slept.
nest morning i called my friends to take breskfast. they were excieted talking about what they heard last night. they said they felt afraid . they heard a noice but have not strenght to see what was it.
they keep talking the whole breaksfast, but i can not say anything, because i ws not able to remember. sudenly mario said that it is very strange taht you did not heard anything, it sound like a dentist equipement, like an electrical saw... that was enough, those were my last words, my key, my integrity of my mind.I felt and lost my concious. twenty four years after that, what i wrote is all i remember. i am not a fanatic to nothing. if you do not believe what i wrote, you should be wrongest that i am.
content.summary: Three space travelers visit my home

content.detailedDescription: Alright, i was walking to my room and looked out the window and saw a bright light. i figured it was a planet. i hadn't seen it before so i stared for about a minute, then it disappeared and a faint light appeared. the light was shaking erradically all around the area for about 3 minutes, i ran outside and watched as it then stabilized itself and started flying over my area. the ufo was a triangle shape and a light would flash on one point, then the next, then the third. two of the lights were normal colored and the other was red. as i watched that one i looked past it and saw another light flashing erradically, got a little spooked, and went inside. but before i went inside i saw another bright light and figured it was a star, i just looked out the window and its gone. i didn't lose sight, i was just spooked.
content.summary: Triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i witness the light hover for over 30min. i saw it first and dismissed it as a star, so i sat and watched tv for about 30min. i glanced outside my kitchen window and the light was brighter. i called the wife to witness it and used binoculars to verify the lights and it was not a star but was flashing bright small red light with large bright lights below the red light but had no lights below the object. while watching it with binoculars the light turned off and it was gone? the light just turned off and the object was gone without a trace. i kept looking for it with the binoculars but did not see anything. we witnessed it from yoder colorado looking west toward the north end of colorado springs.
content.summary: Ufo disappeared while starring at it with binoculars and wife looking at it during the night.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my hot tub just like almost every other night and i was looking at the stars, it was pretty clear that night... then i noticed that a few stars i was looking at were just getting like blocked out? so i sat up and wiped my eyes and got out of the steam coming off the water and was trying to see really good, and i could make out a dark object  (the best way to discribe it is if a cruise liner was going through the ocean with not one light on, you know you can make out the shape, and tell its moving but it was totally dark) also no sound at all. this thing did not want to be seen, it came down and then whent into a clouded part of the sky, so i could see only the back part of it. it was alot..Alot bigger than i thoght ufos would be! i think the thing was triangle shaped but would'nt swear on it, the back was rectangle, but very thick, i'm telling you this thing was big. i was really in shock for a few minutes! i always heard of lights asociated with ufos. this was hard to see  but once i did...I realized there might be alot more ufos flying around than you think? this great big thing was the same color as the night sky and no lights no sound...It's a little scary. i would not have been able to track it if i wasnt looking right at those few stars but once i seen it and followed it and it came down to about 40,000 feet and then the contrast of the clouds was the only time i could really make it out.(it was very stelthy)  the whole sighting lasted less than ten seconds. anyway thats it, i never seen a ufo before or since and i'm 44 years old. by the way i don't drink or smoke anything! and i came in the house and said to my wife "holly shit i just seen a ufo" she said thats nice don't tell anyone else that. what i seen was real... very real.   thanks! larry
content.summary: A dark object came down and then due south. never seen anything like it!

content.detailedDescription:
i remembered when i was a child, my grandmother told me not to go near the river because they had seen weird living creature in the river.  people in our neighborhood are uneducated therefore they do not know what they had encounter, but story told that there was a lot of childs being abducted by this weird living creature.  my grandmother house is about 50 yard from the river and the river is where i like to hang out the most since my mother was always away for business.
  i like to sit on the coconut tree leaning against the river currents, looking at the stars at night. there are several time, i had seen bright star object flying very quickly at night and scope down into the river currents.  i don't know what it was except thinking that it was a falling stars.  some night, i even seen the bright star object move out of the water very quickly and into the sky.  i was confuse about falling stars since it can move down into the river and up into the sky.
  one night, i remembered it was a full moon and i can even see the full moon shinning into the river and my shadow as i walked toward the river with my grandmother.  i had asked my grandmother to come along with me that night because i was scare and i needed to go to the restroom near the river.  we do not have a restroom in the house at that time because we was poor.  as i get closer to the river, my grandmother and i saw two weird living creature sitting on the coconut tree leaning against the river currents that i had always like to sit and watch the stars.  they were talking to each other and their hands are pointing at the stars.  we were standing about 10 feet behind them therefore they don't even notice that we were there.  my grandmother was really scare that she tried to scream but her mouth cannot make any sound.  she grabbed my hand really hard because she was shaking and scare.  at that time, i wasn't scare because i can see their shadow which told me that they are not a ghost and i was amazed of that one minutes encounter with aliens.  i remembered it so clearly like it was yesterday, a feeling that i will never forget until i grow old and die.  the two alien wasn't wearing any clothes as they sit on the coconut tree with there legs hanging down.  they look so friendly and relaxing on that very warm night.  i can see their skin was very white and slippery like fish skin.  there head is so big but no hair.  it seem like they don't have any hair except white slippery skin.  their eyes are so big and dark, but shinny.  their mouth and nose are small.  i can see there fingers are long and also there tose.  they don't seem short to me even thought i was a child, but i know they are taller then my grandmother.  
  i was lost in my curiousity with the aliens body feature.  suddenly, my grandmother scream so loud that the aliens turn their body around and look at us in the eyes for a few second.  they stand up on the coconut tree and dived exactly like the professional olympic swimmer diving contest.  i don't see a lot of water splash in the air and i don't see they ever come up for breathing.  my aunty and uncle rush outside the house and asked, "what had happen."  i was so amazed as to what i had encounter that very night and a little regret that it end so quickly.  in my eyes during that time, they almost look like human being.  at that time, i don't really know what i had encounter but when i got into junior high in the us, then i've finally knew what i had encounter.
  now that i am 35 year of age, i can finally tell a story of my one minute encounter with aliens.  i don't like to tell this story to my friends because i don't want them to look at me differently.  it is weird for people that haven't encounter with aliens, but it is amazing for me to have the opportunity to see aliens once in a lifetime.  i believe there are many undiscover thing in this world that we have not encounter and maybe we are just aliens ourselves.

thank you for taking the time to read my story.

sincerely,
dai nguyen
content.summary: One minute encounter with alien in can tho of vietnam.

content.detailedDescription: This is my 6th sighting,since this night there has been 3 more sightings in the same general part of the sky.I was talking to a friend on the phone when i noticed a bright light in the western sky.I got my binoculars out,,because i have learned from years of watching for ufo's that they are a different kind of light.I watched as it began to swing back and forth like a pendulum then after a few minutes it would go in small circles in a clockwise direction ,,like a corkscrew ,,then back to the pendulum motion.After about 15 minutes it split apart and became 2 different ones.After about 1 minute it went back together and changed colors from blue to green then back to just a bright light.As i watched it would move very quickly from one position to another so fast that i would lose sight through my binoculars and would have to look to find it ,,then it would come back to the same position.After 1 hour and about 10 minutes i noticed 2 more lights come from it and went in a southern direction very quiclky and was out of sight in a blink.After another 10 minutes or so i noticed some red lights below the main one that were a lot closer to me.They appeared to be within a mile or closer and was going back and forth over the tree tops in a pattern ,,like a search pattern.This continued for at least 20 minutes then disappeared to the south and did not return until the next night at about the same time and in the same place doing the same pattern. the main light which appeared first stayed in sight until it went behind some trees out of my sight.The next 2 nights more lights appeared in the same area at about the same time,,,around 7 p.M. eastern time. they would do a seach type pattern in the sky close enough  that i could tell that they made no sound at all. i have seen several in my life ,,,the best and clearest went right over my head and was rotating with different colored lights .It was only about 1000 feet above me at the closest point and made no sound,,then made a 90 degree turn and was gone in a flash.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Appeared as a bright light,,began to swing back and forth like a pendulum then spiral like a corkscrew.

content.detailedDescription:
I would first off like to say that i am not sure why i am sending this, i feel like a fool. however what myself and two others saw was at best... unusual. 
we had taken a vacation at raystown lake in pennsylvania and on our ssecond night we happened to be up late and sitting on the roof of the boat just looking at the sky without the known effects of light polution to which we are used to.
while sitting there chatting and joking around i happened to look up and see two bright "stars" and i knew one of them would be the north star, so joking around and thinking nothing of it i said, "hey who knew there was two north stars...
(that brought to the attention of my friends the second bright star that was equal to or a little brighter than the north star... 
it is at this point that our strange experience happened.)
my friends looked up and approx 5 - 10 seconds pass and then bright star on our right dimmed to almost a non-visible light (if we had not been looking at it when it dimmed we would not have been able to maintain visual conatact) after dimming it moved down (looking up at the sky hold your arm up and make your fingers into the letter c and that would be the approx. distance it moved - taking about 2 seconds to move from index fingertip to thumb tip) it then got brighter than it was before; dimmed again and moved to the left at double the aformention distanced (same speed). it then stopped brightened again then dimmed to the point where once you took your eyes off of it you would not be able to locate it again but only be able to look in that area and guess.
now i have lived on air force bases my whole life and i will not say that this was a "alien craft" but i will say that the light was not in our atmosphere and no airplane i have ever seen can stop in the air.
i do not think that our space shuttles can a. produce such an intense ligth b. move in that way due to (and i am pretending to know here) orbital patterns?
so... there it is. i told someone and know i can be done with this.
i only ask that i not be contacted unless and i mean unless this is a common experience and it has a explanation, or someone has video of the same thing i have seen and only to confirm that what that video shows and what i saw are the same thing.


chris stover
content.summary: While on a houseboat, me and other witnessed a (star) brighten then move then dim

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i arrived at boulder oaks rv resort b/t 1700 and 1800 hrs. we were assigned space 137. after parking our rig and setting up,we had some supper and relaxed as we had been driving most of the day. at approx. 2030-2100 hrs.My wife asked me if i had conneted the sewer line,she wanted to wash some clothes. i had not. i went outside and around to the right side of the trailer(looking from the front) and made the sewer connection. as i stood up,a movement above me caught my eye and i looked up. i observed a flying wing shaped craft proceding west bound parallel to hwy.93. i estimate the speed to be no more than that of cessna 152 at cruise and i could not hear any propulsion sound. i estimate the craft's altitude to be less than 1000 ft. as its shape was clearly visible due to back scatter light from the ground. the craft had five circular white spots(not lights)on the side that i could see. there were no lights visible. if the craft was at 1000ft,i would estimate its wing spread to be approximately 100ft. when i first saw the craft it was approximately above canyon dr. and between hwy.93 and industrial rd. it moved west at constant speed and made a shallow right turn at the railroad pass near the henderson,nv city limit. and passed out of sight.

fot the first eight or ten seconds i stood there astounded,then i yelled for my wife to come out and look. she came out but was under the awning on the trailer and did not get to the right side until it was too late to see the craft.

boulder oaks rv resort is located at 1010 industrial rd.,boulder city,nv 89005. tel. 800-478-5687

i held a private airman's certificate with instrument rating and was a los angeles county deputy sheriff for 34 years(7 regular/27 reserve).
i hold a bs degree in chemistry from ucla and worked many years at several aerpspace firms and at jpl and sri.
content.summary: Oserved flying wing craft w/b parallel to hwy 93. speed est < 100 mph. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 1:00 am relaxing on balcony (approx 60 feet up) with 4 friends; first "vessel" seen moving south parallel to the river over downtown portland. from our vantage point seemed to be moving over the wells fargo tower, altitude unknown, but relatively low. 

object was very bright and there was a visible halo. the "vessel" appeared to be orb-like due to the extremely bright orange fire-colored halo there was a definite disk-like shape. the lights seemed to be at the bottom of the ship, the top of the ship was very hard to make out but was definatley a very large metal structure. 

a second ship of same description came into view moving at the same slow, lurking speed, almost as if they were patrolling or searching for something, a third ship comes into view a few moments later. all three ships pass the northeast corner of the building and are no longer visible. 

we run down the stairs to watch them move across the rest of the sky. they have stopped moving across the city. they are in a clear triangular formation like a 90 degree triangle and are moving vertically up and out of the atmosphere until they can no longer be seen. this upward movement is what really classifies this as a spectacular event. i have been out in the wilderness and seen sattelites and "shooting stars" and can tell the diffence between helicopters and airplanes. these objects were not in these categories, they flew in formation, and were quite odd.

very strange and awesome but spine tingling and scary as well.

i have goosebumps as i place this report here two years later
the event was so odd and mystifying that no one even took a photo, though the event lasted many minutes.

i believe this event to be significant
content.summary: 3 orange disk-like orbs over downtown portland

content.detailedDescription:
(latitude: 7��� 06', south. longitude: 34��� 53', west +3gmt)

i was relaxing in a hammock at my veranda at the 6th floor facing south, 100 m from the beach (to the left, east direction). the night was warm with a clear sky, apart from a few very small clouds (probably not dense "stratus", about 2000 m). 

suddenly, i've noticed two, not so bright, amber orange objects traveling at very high speed from west towards east in a sort of "erratically" side by side path. i was astonished and could hardly breath. then i've noticed they were both cross-shaped with faint lights at the extremities and neon like beams of light connecting the pair of lights to form the cross - there was also a very discrete orange glow around each craft.

the ufos turned right at a wide angle towards southeast, while one crossed below the other and from that point they kept perfect parallel paths, without the previous random components, traveling straight. i could observe them at that moment passing above or through a small cloud.

by estimating the angular size of the objects (~1���=~0.018radian) and multiplying this by the estimated high of that kind of cloud we guess they measured length=~2000m x 0.018radian=36 m which turns up to be about 111 ft.

i'd called my husband but by the time he understood where to look and what for, he could not see anything as they were too far away.
content.summary: Two cross-shaped not very bright amber orange crafts

content.detailedDescription: Warm summer night in 1968 i took my telescope out to look at stars. as i was trying to focus it, a light disrupted me. i thought it was light from the moon but when i looked up it wasn't the moon. it was a disc shaped object with lights around the bottom. i ran into the house to get the family and they thought i was joking until they saw what i saw. our neighbors were watching too. it was about 500' away and i felt we might see someone come to the lights on the bottom. they were similar to windows and i was sure we could of saw someone if they came to the windows. we never saw anyone. i was hoving over a power sub-station and slowly moved to the east. i wanted to get in the car and follow. but the family and neighbors were too afraid. it slowly disappeared out of sight. we called sandpoint naval air station which was less then 3 miles away over the hill and across lake washington. sand point said they were getting a few calls but there was nothing on the radar. i have waited this long out of fear of ridicule. both the power sub-station and sand point naval air station are gone. this sighting was in the finn hill area at about 392'elevation. other people must of seen this but i am unaware if it was reported. when we called sandpoint we felt it was reported but we never hear about again. i would love to know if you have any info on this sighting. please contact me at takrn7@comcast.Net
content.summary: Approx. 50'  disc shaped windows around bottom (like space needle)

content.detailedDescription:
Cold, clear, january night sky, a little after 7 p.M. witness standing at end of house laneway, waiting for car ride from friend.  two homes located to the left and right, at the end of laneway. i live in a small farming village.

out of the corner of my eye, a bright light.  i turn to my right, just as this bright headlight moves straight upward, very slowly, into the sky.  there is a farmers field located where this bright headlight appears.  i dismiss what i'am seeing, literally turn away and look up the road for my ride. i turn back to my right, the bright light appears to be advancing, slowly, in my direction.  distance from me, less than a third of a mile.  again, i pay no real attention.

check again, headlight still advancing in my direction.  i start to pay attention, why?  i realize i cannot hear what i would expect to be engine noises, for something that is approaching not from too far away?

this slow, noiseless, bright headlight, keeps approaching.  i watch as it moves over and above, the roof top of a house, just above the  t.V. atenna on the roof top peak.  it's still moving very slowly in my direction.  the night is cold, but i'am feeling even more cold at that moment. my thoughts are not giving me a "word" to explain what this is?  planes have definite engine noises.  this has no engine noise, no noise, whatsoever??

as this bright headlight nears the house roof top of the home to the right of where i'am standing, i still cannot hear anything?  i'am straining my ears and eyes, looking for it's shape, size, any kind of shape structure. nothing visible, even though, the night sky is cloudless and clear?

just above the house roof top, again the height of roof top t.V. atenna, the bright headlight disappears? no noise?  i'am looking up, above me in the sky, 6x large green lights, spaced large distance apart, in circular formation appear.  i force myself not to blink and count these lights, as slowly as the lights are moving overhead.  i'am able to repeat my count of them 7x times, that is how slow the lights move overhead.  i cannot see any structural shape above the green lights.  i'am assuming i was looking up under the belly of something? suddenly, there's a loud rumble/roar, as it moves over rooftop of home to my right, green lights disappear, no more nosie, it's gone!  i ran back to my home.  asked my husband if he heard anything, stated no!  i never told him what i saw, i didn't know how.

judging from the width of the green lights that were in a circle shape, i'd have to put the size of this thing to be the approx. size of the property our home was located on.  so, if it had landed, there's no doubt in my mind, it would of taken up the entire 2 1/2 acres or more, of land that our home was built on.  this is best i can do as far as describing size, even though i visibly could not see any shape above the green lights?

over the years i have only told three close family members, and one close friend what i saw that evening.  when telling them the events of what i saw, i could not bring myself to even consider, that it could of been a ufo?  the thought disturbs me to this day.  i even avoid looking into the night sky, for fear i might see it again.  this is the first time i'am putting this in print.

thank you for your time.  maybe this information will help others, i hope.
content.summary: Advancing bright headlight in night sky, no engine noises.  as advancing light turns out, no engine noise.  unidentified, something?  spaced large distance apart, 6x green lights on under belly , no visible shape or structure.

content.detailedDescription:
i worked all day at arizona snowbowl ski resort. i went home after work and went to bed early(10-10:30pm). the next thing i know is that i woke up i believe anround 1-1:30am, not sure exactly what time, due to a feeling of a presence of someone looking at me. all i really remember is a person with a rather large head and eyes looking down on me in bed. i tryed to move, but wasn't able to. there must have been some sort of force field holding me down. all i could use were my hands and barely able to lift my head with all my energy. the only thing i could do was flip the bird to this person/being. i know it sounds funny, but this event scarred me so bad, i couldn't sleep in my bed for weeks fearing they would come back.
 now heres where the story turns twisted. i had not told anyone but my father what had happened to me. he thought that it was just a dream and kind of laughed. three to four weeks later, my younger brother devin had the exact same thing happen to him in his room. i had not told him anything about this sighting. i noticed he wasn't sleeping in his room for a while, so i asked him what was going on. he told me that he had an encounter with something not from this world in his room the night before. he then explained to me exactly to detail what had happened to me a month or so prior to him.
 if you guys have any questions or comments, feel free to e-mail me at darkskycitymob@yahoo.Com. i am still kind of freaked about this. not one day goes by that i don't think about this. please try to explain! have others had similar experiences.

 sincerely, eric dosh
content.summary: Had seen a being looking over me in bed, where i couldnt move anymore.
